question: epidemiologists attempt to explain the link between health and variables such as
vanilla_rag_result: Epidemiologists attempt to explain the link between health and variables such as individual-level measures (e.g., poverty, education, social isolation), contextual factors (e.g., residential segregation or income inequality), and social policies (e.g., policies creating income security or promoting educational access). They analyze how these factors influence health outcomes and aim to understand the origins of health disparities, as well as identify strategies to eliminate them.
